name: Rock Game
description:
A submission from May 2020 to the montly Ben Hagle of the Month competition. Learn more about the competition at https://broumvirate.com/bhotm

Choose your fighter, then choose your rock! Then, it's time to start throwing.

To progress through each level, you must complete the designated objective. For levels 1-3, the goal is to throw the rock so that it lands inside the stack of large rocks, without touching any of them, while throwing the rock in the designated way: overhand, underhand, or "granny"-style (like how your grandmother probably bowls). For level 4, "Bounce-bounce", your goal is to skip the rock across the goalposts; and for level 5, "Top", you must land your rock on top of the tower.

The game tracks your time, and it literally doesn't have a quit button, so hope you're ready to get stuck for a very long time.

Programming and Artwork: Alden Burgess

Music by Jacob Sanner

Featuring the likenesses of Alden Burgess, Jacob Sanner, Kai Fox, Emerson Jeffrey, and Benjamin Hagle.
